segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is helping him, but she's not doing anything to keep him safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and it's making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the puddle getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could slip and fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't hear the water running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up this mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
